name: Prasanna Lohar
experience: Founder & President of India Blockchain Forum
details: CEO of Block Stack and President of India Blockchain Forum, driving innovation in blockchain and Web3. He advises Union Bank of India and was formerly Chief Innovation Officer at DCB Bank. A LinkedIn Top Voice and board member, he’s recognized for leadership in fintech, regtech, and digital banking.
